Container.Name: Internxt-CLI-WebDAV
Container.Overview: This container provides a stable WebDAV server for Internxt Drive using Auth Token authentication. Find your Auth Token via browser developer tools during login on the Internxt website.

Config.Name: WebDAV Port
Config.Description: The external port for the WebDAV service. Change this if the port is already in use.

Config.Name: Config Path
Config.Description: This is where the container stores its persistent configuration file.

Config.Name: Auth Token
Config.Description: Required: Your Internxt Auth Token (find via browser dev tools).
